name: Santa's Surprise (Mic1211)
description:
This is a game that I made for the 48hr  Yogscast Jingle Jam Game Jam. The theme was surprise. The object of the game is to surprise Santa with gifts that you find around the island. You might be surprised by what you find.

At it's heart this game is an exploration game and was not meant to be completely seen in one playthrough. There are  23 different items to find, can you find them all? Also there are a few little quaint secrets about the gameplay to discover. Hope you have fun.

This game was made with Unity. Special thanks to Polyperfect and their Low Poly Pack 4 as well as  Kevin Iglesias for the run cycle.
